name: Network Information
description: The network information object describes the type, reputation, and associated addresses of a network interface.

name.description: The name of the network interface.

hostname.name: Hostname
hostname.description: The hostname associated with the network interface.

ip.description: The IP address associated with the network interface.

ipv4.description: The IPv4 address associated with the network interface.

ipv6.description: The IPv6 address associated with the network interface.

mac.description: The MAC address of the network interface.
